message_1: A Playfair cipher has been encrypted with the keyword "MATH". The message is "WSEBMLTHKHAJ". Decrypt the message and find the original plaintext message.
message_2:
To decrypt the message using the Playfair cipher, we first need to create a 5x5 grid using the keyword "MATH" and the remaining letters of the alphabet (excluding J, as it is combined with I in the Playfair cipher).

1. Remove duplicate letters from the keyword: MATH
2. Create the 5x5 grid:

   M  A  T  H  B
   C  D  E  F  G
   I/K L  N  O  P
   Q  R  S  U  V
   W  X  Y  Z

3. Now, we will decrypt the message "WSEBMLTHKHAJ" by dividing it into digraphs and applying the Playfair decryption rules:

   WS  EB  ML  TH  KH  AJ

   - WS: W and S are in the same row, so replace them with the letters to their left (wrap around if needed). W -> V, S -> R. Decrypted digraph: VR
   - EB: E and B are in the same row, so replace them with the letters to their left (wrap around if needed). E -> D, B -> H. Decrypted digraph: DH
   - ML: M and L are in different rows and columns, so form a rectangle with them and replace them with the letters in the same row but on the other corner. M -> A, L -> I. Decrypted digraph: AI
   - TH: T and H are in the same row, so replace them with the letters to their left (wrap around if needed). T -> S, H -> B. Decrypted digraph: SB
   - KH: K (combined with I) and H are in different rows and columns, so form a rectangle with them and replace them with the letters in the same row but on the other corner. K -> L, H -> G. Decrypted digraph: LG
   - AJ: A and J (combined with I) are in different rows and columns, so form a rectangle with them and replace them with the letters in the same row but on the other corner. A -> M, J -> T. Decrypted digraph: MT

4. Combine the decrypted digraphs to get the original plaintext message: VRDHAI SBLGMT

Please note that the plaintext message might not make sense, as the Playfair cipher is a simple substitution cipher and can be easily broken with modern techniques. The decrypted message might also need further deciphering or interpretation.
